author: hairong
msg: HADOOP-5145. Balancer sometimes runs out of memory after running days or weeks. Contributed by Hairong Kuang.

author: gtully
msg: AMQ-2094. fix break of org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.SslContextNBrokerServiceTest where localhost and host name resolve to different interfaces as now the broker just listens on one interface unless ip:0.0.0.0 is used. The connectorUri did nore reflect the socket
